instruction: Create a list of things to do in Las Vegas.
output:
- Visit the Las Vegas Strip.
- Explore the Bellagio and other luxurious casinos.
- Visit the nearby sights such as the Hoover Dam, Valley of Fire State Park, and Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area.
- Take in a show at one of the many theatres.
- Participate in a helicopter tour of the Grand Canyon.
- Try your luck at one of the many world-famous casinos.
- Explore Fremont Street and see its iconic light show.
- Take a dip in a luxurious hotel pool.
- Visit some of the unique museums such as the Pinball Hall of Fame and The Mob Museum.
- Browse the outdoor shopping centres or hit up the outlets.
